body: Also for some reason I decided to try my hand at translating this, it's all MTL since I can't read moon runes... uploaded it to e-hentai a little while ago so it will probably be added on here soon enough

So pretty much what happens here is boy and girl really loves each other. After a while the girl finds the boy's porn which all NTR she asks him if this is his fetish and if he would like to become a cuck and if it happened he'd still love her? Then guy denies it and say's it's only porn but get's a hard on which she notices. Then she tells him she'd do anything for him cause she loves him so much. She then goes on to cheat left and right while making sure he's always able to see or hear it to a certain degree. At first the bf just suspects it and even say's he sometimes imagines that he's gettin cucked. Then it becomes blatently obvious as the girl just takes it further and further until the boy can't deny it anymore and even being told outright by his neighbour he's fucking the gf right now. He then say's he still loves her but does she still love him? She say's yes, I love you! But the neighbour say's something like she's mine now.

Then she goes over to him naked and with sperm dripping out saying she's full with sperm and I believe become like this for him. He then say's "You've become such a mess" and "I'll love you till your completely broken". Then it skips to the next day with the neighbour comming out and saying damn that girl was such a nice fuck I gotta keep fucking her more and more till she's mine. Then the bf and gf comes out and the bf tells him thanks for last night with taking care of my gf. But never do it again, capiche? Then the neighbour say's something like I better stop or I am gonna get stabbed. So pretty much bf had a NTR fetish loving gf found out and acts it out for him without his knowledge or consent and then seemingly he still accepts her but no more NTR.
